meanings.sent1: The nonnasal sound came from his mouth.
meanings.sent2: She preferred nonnasal scents for her candles.
meanings.sent3: The nonnasal joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her nonnasal approach to problem-solving was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The nonnasal sensation of the lotion was soothing.

meanings.definition: Not related to or affecting the nose.
meanings.sent1: The medication had a nonnasal side effect.
meanings.sent2: He chose a nonnasal topic for his research paper.
meanings.sent3: The nonnasal weather forecast was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her nonnasal advice was surprisingly helpful.
meanings.sent5: The nonnasal design of the car was innovative.
